bio.txt.content:
VISHAL VARSHNEY

Software Developer specializing in backend systems and scalable architecture.

Focused on building reliable APIs, enterprise systems, and automation tools using Java and Spring Boot.

Strong experience in database optimization, cloud integrations, and document automation.

Interested in distributed systems, system design, and high-performance backend engineering.

GitHub: https://github.com/real-varshney
LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/real-varshney
